Walking into the Mill Diamonds store was an absolutely amazing experience.
Maurice and his wife really took the time, understood what we were looking for, provided great advice and delivered an amazing final custom product. Couldn't not recommend them more, an absolute gem!

Name: The Mill
Review Text: Couldn’t recommend more. Their attention to detail is amazing and passion is clear to see. They offer a great after care service, cleaning and inspecting the jewellery whenever you want. If you are after a beautiful bespoke piece this is the place to go.

Name: The Mill
Review Text: Both Denise and Maurice did a wonderful job in creating the perfect engagement ring for my fiance! We viewed a number of stones, and after finding the perfect one, they designed the band and setting to our preference. I would highly recommend you go and speak with them if your in the Amsterdam area. Thank you both!

Review Text:

Highly recommend Mill Diamonds as they think, conceptualize and work with you to make it special & unique! Thanks a lot Maurice and Denise! Hope to see you soon! <3
